Package br.com.armange.commons.thread.async

Class ResourceTryAsyncBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.armange.commons.thread.async.AbstractTryAsyncBuilder<ResourceTryAsyncBuilder>
      • br.com.armange.commons.thread.async.ResourceTryAsyncBuilder
  • public class ResourceTryAsyncBuilder
extends AbstractTryAsyncBuilder<ResourceTryAsyncBuilder>
    It is a thread builder that assists in creating structured threads to simulate a set of try-with-resources blocks.
    Since:
    2020-06-22 V1.1.0 (JDK 1.8)
    See Also:
    TryAsyncBuilder

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class br.com.armange.commons.thread.async.AbstractTryAsyncBuilder

        exceptionConsumers, finalizingExecutables

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void execute()
      From the configuration parameters previously provided in the thread constructor, a new thread will be configured and executed so that it can simulate a try-catch-finally code block or a try-with-resources code block.
      The consumer of closable objects will be executed taking the closable objects as a parameter.
      protected static ResourceTryAsyncBuilder tryAsync​(java.io.Closeable closeable, ResourceConsumer attemptedExecution)
      Generates a new thread builder to configure its operations simulating a try-with-resources implementation.

      • Methods inherited from class br.com.armange.commons.thread.async.AbstractTryAsyncBuilder

        addCatcher, addFinalizer, consumeExceptionIfExists, execute, execute, finallyAsync

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • tryAsync

        protected static ResourceTryAsyncBuilder tryAsync​(java.io.Closeable closeable,
                                                  ResourceConsumer attemptedExecution)
        Generates a new thread builder to configure its operations simulating a try-with-resources implementation.
        Parameters:
        closeable - The closeable resource.
        attemptedExecution - The implementation that will consumes the resource.
        Returns:
        A new thread builder.

      • execute

        public void execute()
        From the configuration parameters previously provided in the thread constructor, a new thread will be configured and executed so that it can simulate a try-catch-finally code block or a try-with-resources code block.
        The consumer of closable objects will be executed taking the closable objects as a parameter.
        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractTryAsyncBuilder<ResourceTryAsyncBuilder>
        See Also:
        AbstractTryAsyncBuilder.execute(java.util.concurrent.Callable, java.util.function.Consumer)
